definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (in form like the inf. of the Arab. VIII. conj. from [[שָׁאַל]]: so [[אֶשְׁתְּמׂעַ]] from [[שָׁמַע]]. Perh. Arabic-speaking tribes may have settled in parts of S. of Judah) city of Danites in the [[שְׁפֵלָה]] of Judah, named with [[חָרְעָה]] Jos 15:33, Jos 19:41, Ju Jdg 13:25, Jdg 16:31, Jdg 18:2, Jdg 18:8, Jdg 18:11; perh. mod. Eshû‘ª Survey:iii. 25 Guerin:Pal. ii. 13 f. 382.
